title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/markdown-kit
name: Markdown Kit
author: oeyoews
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/markdown-kit/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/markdown-kit/icon","text":" ","type":"image/svg+xml"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/markdown-kit/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/markdown-kit/readme","text":"

Markdown Kit

A collection of extensions for Markdown

NOTE

  • 目前 markdown 有一个比较严重的错误，但是可以规避 github issue
  • 不要拖拽此插件，否则插件依赖不会安装，请使用 CPL 安装

  • codemirror-mode-markdown 依赖插件 mode-xml

    TODO

  • 给重写的配置加上一个用户开关配置，默认开启

  • 测试依赖
  • 将 markdown kit 的 readme 借助工具 (比如 pandoc) 转换成 html(假设用户没有安装 markdowns 所以简介只用用 html 写)
    • https://markdowntohtml.com/
","type":"text/markdown","caption":"Markdown Kit","description":"Markdown Kit"},"$:/core/ui/Actions/new-journal":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Actions/new-journal","description":"create a new journal tiddler","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ \whitespace trim <$vars journalTitleTemplate={{$:/config/NewJournal/Title}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags!!tags}} journalText={{$:/config/NewJournal/Text}}> <$wikify name="journalTitle" text="<$macrocall $name='now' format=<>/>"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" type="text/markdown" title=<> tags=<> text={{{ [get[]] }}}/> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" type="text/markdown" title=<> tags=<> text=<>/> "},"$:/core/ui/Actions/new-tiddler-md":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Actions/new-tiddler-md","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","description":"create a new empty tiddler","text":" \define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ \whitespace trim <$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/NewTiddler/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/NewTiddler/Tags!!tags}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" tags=<> type="text/markdown" /> "}}}
